summary: E2E testing of Mission Board feature for Dubai Global Launch. All 9 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI loads correctly at /mission-board with countdown timer, 7 verticals progress cards, leaderboard, and activity feed. Mission Board button in Command Centre header works correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/captain/mission-board - Returns launch countdown, readiness %, verticals progress
GET /api/captain/mission-board - All 7 vertical codes present (B2G, B2A, B2B, B2C, B2D, D2D, A2A)
GET /api/captain/mission-board/activity - Returns activity feed with points
GET /api/captain/mission-board/leaderboard - Returns ranked verticals with badges
POST /api/captain/mission-board/log-milestone - Logs custom milestone successfully
POST /api/captain/mission-board/log-milestone - Invalid vertical returns 400
POST /api/captain/mission-board/log-milestone - All milestone types work (leader_assigned, kata_started, kata_completed, orbit_achieved, team_expanded, first_win)
Integration: Leader assignment updates mission board readiness
Integration: Activity feed shows recent leader assignments
Frontend: /mission-board route loads Mission Board page
Frontend: Countdown timer with Days, Hours, Min, Sec - updates every second
Frontend: 7 verticals progress cards with readiness %
Frontend: Leaderboard with rankings and badges (ðŸ¥‡ðŸ¥ˆðŸ¥‰)
Frontend: Activity feed with points (+100 pts, +50 pts)
Frontend: Mission Board button in Command Centre header
Frontend: Navigation from Command Centre to Mission Board works
Frontend: Back button navigates to Command Centre
Frontend: Refresh button refreshes data with toast notification
Frontend: Launch readiness circular progress indicator
Frontend: Mission status badge (ACCELERATE/ON_TRACK/etc)
critical_code_review_comments: Mission Board implementation is complete and well-structured
All 4 backend APIs working correctly with proper error handling
Countdown timer updates every second using setInterval
Leaderboard correctly sorted by readiness percentage descending
Activity feed shows leader assignments and onboarding milestones with points
All UI elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Military command style design consistent with Captain Command Centre
seed_data_creation: Test leaders and milestones created during testing (prefixed with TEST_)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mission Board is a new feature for Dubai Global Launch tracking. Key features: 1) Countdown timer to 2026-01-09 (Dubai timezone) with Days/Hours/Min/Sec updating every second, 2) 7 verticals progress cards showing readiness % (0-100), 3) Leaderboard ranking verticals by readiness with badges (ðŸ¥‡ðŸ¥ˆðŸ¥‰), 4) Activity feed showing leader assignments and onboarding milestones with points, 5) Auto-refresh every 30 seconds. Backend APIs at /api/captain/mission-board/* all working. Frontend at /mission-board route. MongoDB collection: mission_activities. All 9 backend tests passed. All frontend UI elements working correctly.
